name: distributionGroups_bulkDeleteApps
description: Delete apps from distribution group in an org

distribution_group_name.description: The name of the distribution group

apps.description: The list of apps to delete from the distribution group

name.description: The name of the app to be deleted from the distribution group

body.description: The name of the apps to be deleted from the distribution group. The apps have to be owned by the organization.
